title: Interactive Texture Segmentation of 3D Scanned Models
authors: Koki Madono, Takeo Igarashi, Hiroharu Kato, Taisuke Hashimoto, Fabrice Matulic, Tsukasa Takagi, Keita Higuchi
abstract: We present an interactive texture segmentation workflow for 3D scanned models. The system combines user guidance with geometric and appearance cues on the surface to produce clean, consistent regions suitable for editing and downstream processing. We evaluate on diverse real scans and report improvements in region accuracy and editing time.

title: Data-Driven Ink Painting Brushstroke Rendering
abstract: We propose a data-driven approach to synthesize ink painting brushstrokes. Using example strokes, our method models stroke appearance and dynamics to generate plausible results that preserve characteristic textures and tapering while remaining controllable for design and illustration workflows.
